Reviews.Title: Great kit to start your DSLR camera adventure
Reviews.Author: Douglas W. Decampos
Reviews.Content: It is my first DSLR camera and you cannot buy the body only, you must have a couple of devices. Everything included is awesome products EXCEPT the screen protector which was lost in the first day besides the work and bubbles when I was placing it.The bag is excellent and fits everything which comes with the kit plus another lense. Also the bag is original from Nikon.The battery extra is very handling and I liked the extra charger which has support to international outlets and has car adapter. The memory card is a great one to store your memories and with reasonable storage space and writing speed. The cleaning kit is awesome and has everything you need to mantain your lenses and camera, the remote control is another important device to take picture of yourself and those pictures from the tripod without shaking, you will use it a lot!  The tripod is perfect size for travel and comes with a bag to carry it. The hdmi cable is another required to show it on tv and you really need since the display is small to give you all picture details. The flash is very basic, I have been happy with the built-in but you will need it to cover wedding and other events. Finally the lense is original from Nikon and the right size to carry it on your adventures, the 300mm is too big, 18-200mm you cover 90% of your needs. I recomend you just add a fish eye lense and a 35mm or 50mm to make your camera lighter. The filter is very important in order to protect your lenses against accident and also it is easier to clean a filter than a camera. Finally the wallet to store memory cards it is handy even though I am not using it since the camera comes with 2 slots which for me it is more than enough storage.About the camera, I am very pleased with the photos quality and features. You must read a book to understand about the aperture, iso and shuttle to take full advantage. The automatic modes will not do all the work. I have been using it for 2months so far and it is amazing. I recommend to buy a silicone cover to protect the body.

Reviews.Title: Great photographer's package!
Reviews.Author: Elaine Lewis
Reviews.Content: This high quality Nikon camera body with the lens, filter, SD card, flash, and much much more makes it easy to have what you need altogether, and makes it possible to start taking pictures wherever and whenever you need right away! It has great backup supplies, like an extra battery and charger. It is also a genuine Nikon product with the instructions and warranty!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: Daryl
Reviews.Content: Pros: It is a complete kit and comes with everything you would need to start a professional photography business. The 64GB is amazing, but I would be wearing of actually filling it with content.The camera takes great photos!!Cons: This package didn't come with a wide angle lens.

Reviews.Title: I just love my new camera!
Reviews.Author: Melody K.
Reviews.Content: Great product. Love my new camera.  Taking tons of pictures for lots of practice! Tons of settings the possibilities are endless.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: nm girl
Reviews.Content: I am a beginner photographer, it is very easy to use, pictures are just unbelievable. I was skeptical first since I never owned DSLR camera before but I am very happy with my purchase. I still haven't used the extra stuff that came in the package but plan to use it soon. The lens 18-200 mm can be used from taking protrait, macro, landscape to sports and many more situations, I like it because you dont have to keep on changing the lenses. The pictures are sharp and very nice. I hardly use any photoshop. I LOVE THIS CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it. Need go through instruction to master Camera. Excellent Pictures.
Reviews.Author: geyoul k.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband. He loves it. Excellent pictures. Need read instruction carefully to master on this camera. It would be nicer to get extra booklet about Nikon D7100 to get more information on this camera.  It is well made and very professional.  I recommend highly in this package which  you will find everything you need to take a pictures. Memory card with 64 GB with highest speed, you would not worry about any space to taking video and numerous pictures. It is a great value in this package. It is nice things about this camera with 18-200 mm, you could take a picture  from very close scene and zooming out to long distance.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: WAB
Reviews.Content: Fantastic package.  Love this lens!!!  Yes it is bigger and a little heavy but it is well worth it to have the zoom range.  I would buy this again without hesitation just so I won't ever have to swap lenses again.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-200mm VR II AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Battery Charger +
<7> Vivitar 72mm UV Glass Filter + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-200mm Lens + 64GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Flash + Filter + Tripod + Accessory Kit
